body: It's because of `Sequential`. `AnyModule` can't handle default arguments, so we need one overload that takes a variable and produces a variable in order to pack it into `Sequential`
body_html: It's because of Sequential. AnyModule can't handle default arguments, so we need one overload that takes a variable and produces a variable in order to pack it into Sequential
